name: Casa de los Azulejos

reviews.text: The Casa de los Azulejos is a charming hotel. The named rooms are set around a pretty courtyard, with an indoor/outdoor breakfast patio. It is part of the Rusticae group.
reviews.title: Lovely spot to stay; hard to find!

likes.disliked: — Finding it the first time by car

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel's location itself is initially very difficult to find, since Cordoba's older area is a maze of one-way streets. We were lost for well over a half-hour initially. They do have limited off-site parking, but make sure you book it in advance.
reviews.title: Very nice hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The front office staff is very helpful, and speak English well. They directed us to the nearby sights, all within easy walking distance, including the magnificent Mezquita and Alcazar.
reviews.title: Hard to find but worth it...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We only overnighted in Cordoba, but would have liked to stay here a few days longer. Highly recommended.
reviews.title: Different and Pleasant

likes.disliked: — the receptionist could have been more helpful when booking in

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2003, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very nice hotel in perfect location to see the sites in Cordoba. Courtyard to hang out and have coffe after the included breakfast. Clean rooms with modern bathrooms. The owner really makes the difference. He always seemed to be around to help out, give advice, or just chat. We would definately stay again.
reviews.title: A Real Gem in Cordoba

likes.disliked: — Book directly with the hotel for best room and rate.

reviews.title: Charming lobby and hosts
reviews.text: Wonderful old house with the typical Spanish courtyard and fountain in the middle. The rooms are big and the bathrooms bigger, all with antique furniture. Very relaxed and personal attention.

aka: Casa De Los Azulejos Hotel Cordoba
